p.s: Fast Fashion - the problems in the textile industry

In the germanGerman article Fast Fashion: Unser Kleiderkonsum ist Wahnsinn, published by Spiegel Online on 21 December 2017 Jörg Oberwittler interviews Imke Müller-Hellmann who wanted to find out more of our clothes and flew for that to the sources, about the problems in the textile industry and what measures could improve the situation.
She explains how huge and bad the effects of the industry on the environment and our planet is and talks about the example BangladeschBangladesh.
